mhsjava
Class MineField.Square

java.lang.Object
  mhsjava.MineField.Square
Enclosing class:
MineField
 class MineField.Square
extends java.lang.Object

The data structure behind every square in the minefield. - class MineField uses a 2D array of Squares, i.e. Square[][]
